name: smooth_functions_tower
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H M
⊢ IsScalarTower 𝕜 (ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M 𝕜 ↑Top.top) (ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M 𝕜 ↑Top.top)
decl: instance smooth_functions_tower : IsScalarTower 𝕜 C^∞⟮I, M; 𝕜⟯ C^∞⟮I, M; 𝕜⟯ := by infer_instance

name: PointedContMDiffMap.instIsScalarTowerSomeENatTopContMDiffMapModelWithCornersSelf
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H M
x : M
⊢ IsScalarTower 𝕜 (PointedContMDiffMap 𝕜 I M (↑Top.top) x) (ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M 𝕜 ↑Top.top)
decl:
instance {x : M} : IsScalarTower 𝕜 C^∞⟮I, M; 𝕜⟯⟨x⟩ C^∞⟮I, M; 𝕜⟯ :=
  IsScalarTower.right

name: PointedContMDiffMap.smul_def
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H M
x : M
f : PointedContMDiffMap 𝕜 I M (↑Top.top) x
k : 𝕜
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul f k) (HMul.hMul (f x) k)
decl:
theorem smul_def (x : M) (f : C^∞⟮I, M; 𝕜⟯⟨x⟩) (k : 𝕜) : f • k = f x * k :=
  rfl

name: PointedContMDiffMap.instIsScalarTowerSomeENatTop
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H M
x : M
⊢ IsScalarTower 𝕜 (PointedContMDiffMap 𝕜 I M (↑Top.top) x) 𝕜
decl:
instance (x : M) : IsScalarTower 𝕜 C^∞⟮I, M; 𝕜⟯⟨x⟩ 𝕜 where
  smul_assoc k f h := by
    rw [smul_def, smul_def, ContMDiffMap.coe_smul, Pi.smul_apply, smul_eq_mul, smul_eq_mul,
      mul_assoc]

name: Derivation.evalAt_apply
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H M
X : Derivation 𝕜 (ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M 𝕜 ↑Top.top) (ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M 𝕜 ↑Top.top)
f : ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M 𝕜 ↑Top.top
x : M
⊢ Eq (((Derivation.evalAt x) X) f) ((X f) x)
decl:
theorem evalAt_apply (x : M) : evalAt x X f = (X f) x :=
  rfl

name: fdifferential_apply
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
E' : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E'
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E'
H' : Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H'
I' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E' H'
M' : Type u_7
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M'
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H' M'
f : ContMDiffMap I I' M M' ↑Top.top
x : M
v : PointDerivation I x
g : ContMDiffMap I' (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M' 𝕜 ↑Top.top
⊢ Eq (((fdifferential f x) v) g) (v (g.comp f))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem fdifferential_apply (f : C^∞⟮I, M; I', M'⟯) {x : M} (v : PointDerivation I x)
    (g : C^∞⟮I', M'; 𝕜⟯) : 𝒅 f x v g = v (g.comp f) :=
  rfl

name: apply_fdifferential

𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
E' : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E'
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E'
H' : Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H'
I' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E' H'
M' : Type u_7
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M'
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H' M'

x : M
v : PointDerivation I x
g : ContMDiffMap I' (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M' 𝕜 ↑Top.top
⊢ Eq (((fdifferential f x) v) g) (v (g.comp f))

name: hfdifferential_apply
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
E' : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E'
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E'
H' : Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H'
I' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E' H'
M' : Type u_7
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M'
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H' M'
f : ContMDiffMap I I' M M' ↑Top.top
x : M
y : M'
h : Eq (f x) y
v : PointDerivation I x
g : ContMDiffMap I' (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M' 𝕜 ↑Top.top
⊢ Eq (((hfdifferential h) v) g) (((fdifferential f x) v) g)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem hfdifferential_apply {f : C^∞⟮I, M; I', M'⟯} {x : M} {y : M'} (h : f x = y)
    (v : PointDerivation I x) (g : C^∞⟮I', M'; 𝕜⟯) : 𝒅ₕ h v g = 𝒅 f x v g :=
  rfl

name: apply_hfdifferential
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
E' : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E'
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E'
H' : Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H'
I' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E' H'
M' : Type u_7
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M'
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H' M'
f : ContMDiffMap I I' M M' ↑Top.top
x : M
y : M'
h : Eq (f x) y
v : PointDerivation I x
g : ContMDiffMap I' (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) M' 𝕜 ↑Top.top
⊢ Eq (((hfdifferential h) v) g) (((fdifferential f x) v) g)

name: fdifferential_comp
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁵ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝¹⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝¹² : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝¹¹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝¹⁰ : ChartedSpace H M
E' : Type u_5
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E'
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E'
H' : Type u_6
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H'
I' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E' H'
M' : Type u_7
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M'
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H' M'
E'' : Type u_8
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup E''
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E''
H'' : Type u_9
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace H''
I'' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E'' H''
M'' : Type u_10
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace M''
inst✝ : ChartedSpace H'' M''
g : ContMDiffMap I' I'' M' M'' ↑Top.top
f : ContMDiffMap I I' M M' ↑Top.top
x : M
⊢ Eq (fdifferential (g.comp f) x) ((fdifferential g (f x)).comp (fdifferential f x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem fdifferential_comp (g : C^∞⟮I', M'; I'', M''⟯) (f : C^∞⟮I, M; I', M'⟯) (x : M) :
    𝒅 (g.comp f) x = (𝒅 g (f x)).comp (𝒅 f x) :=
  rfl
